class.name: HingeJoint
class.description: Normaly uses the z-axis of body A as the hinge axis, another axis can be specified when adding it manually though.

members.member: The speed with which the rotation across the axis perpendicular to the hinge gets corrected.
If [code]true[/code] the hinges maximum and minimum rotation, defined by [member angular_limit/lower] and [member angular_limit/upper] has effects.
The minimum rotation. only active if [member angular_limit/enable] is [code]true[/code].
The lower this value, the more the rotation gets slowed down.
The maximum rotation. only active if [member angular_limit/enable] is [code]true[/code].
When activated, a motor turns the hinge.
